p:
This means that, in despite of the very efficient measures undertaken to limit the virus spread, it is still around us accomplishing its ultimate goal - several million people are still infected. It is possible that the herd immunity finally emerges – but the most important aspect to consider is that, while the virus is still travelling among humans (and animals), its mutations continue, and some new specimen will appear with other more efficient munition to defeat homo sapiens. As is often said, it is not a question of if, but when. The struggle SARS-CoV-2 x Homo Sapiens will still endure.
